room_title: Escape room "The Detective's Office" by Escape Hour Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Had a great time! We went with a group of about 10 and did the Detective's Room, we made it out with 7 seconds to spare! Staff were friendly and made the whole experience fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Detective's Office" by Escape Hour Charlotte in Charlotte
review: My son and I were there today and had the BEST time in the Murder Mystery room. We really enjoyed our time, and we are definitely going to be back to try more rooms with Dad in tow! Thanks so much for a fun time.

room_title: Escape room "The Detective's Office" by Escape Hour Charlotte in Charlotte
review: This place is so much fun to do with friends. It makes you think and work together! It's challenging and you get addicted to solving all the rooms and want to come back for more. Awesome place staff is super friendly and helpful!
